TopicTitle: Make the gizmo usable with mouse wheel

Articles.Content: As the title said. Actually it's pretty difficult to make "precision moves" with the gizmo due to fact that a mouse can't be very precise. (Especially if you have a low DPI mouse, ugh notebook) It would be nice to have the same thing of manuever nodes, simply you can stay above the "arrow" then moving the mouse wheel you can make precise movement.

Yes!

And: have a selector to change the amount of degrees/distance. I often want to turn a part only 0.5 degrees but then it jumps with 5. 

The editor is an amazing piece of work since 0.90 but it can be improved!
